lines.text: [Dave and Tex ride up to Panhandle who is making smoke signals and chanting incoherently]
Well, what are you trying to do, Panhandle?
Sure! You're givin' an imitation of a razorback hog stuck in a barbed-wire fence.
No, that ain't it at all! We're near Indian country, ain't we? Well, I'm practicin' talkin' Indian, throwin' up smoke signals, practicin' sign language - I'm getting' prepared!
Ah, we were only kiddin', Panhandle. Understood every word you said, didn't we, Dave?
Sure did, and you're dead right - we've got to be prepared. In fact, we'll hold a counsel of war right now.
If people find out that the three strangers around here are lawmen, we won't find out nothin' from nobody, especially about who's killin' trappers and Indians around here.
Well, Panhandle's right again. If we're going to solve the mystery, we've got to work undercover.
